name: Super Treasure Arena
description: Super Treasure Arena is a frantic, retro-inspired arena shooter for up to 4 players, where collecting and stealing loot from your opponents is the key to victory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9400 (512 MB) or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i3 @ 2.5 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1 GB) or Radeon HD 5850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space
